Reviews.Content: 2nd stay impressed time spacious esp amsterdam comfy times tea coffee facilties appreciated british varied fresh continental breakfast bathroom larger expected heated mirror steamed minutes walk central station leaving stn road past albert supermarket handy easy miss rounded steps disadvantage stairs climb reception reach main lift

Reviews.Title: “Simply very good - Location and Service”
Reviews.Author: justinchopper
Reviews.Content: hotel opposite central station 10 minutes walk city centre clean anyway vacation stay breakfast perfect rates enjoy amsterdam hotel exceeded expectations tip 2nd floor ground floor bigger

Reviews.Title: “Great Location & Great Price”

Reviews.Title: “Good price”

Reviews.Content: value hotel central location convenient train station main attractions amsterdam extremely clean comfortable breakfast staff extremely helpful friendly value money amsterdam pay wifi 6 euros half day 10 euros day

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location near the train station”
Reviews.Author: peterling1
Reviews.Content: stayed 27 30 2011 hotel 200 metres central train station beautiful amsterdam central station 10 min walk attractions anne frank house visit flower market pancake shop canal boat convenient 1st timer amsterdam nice clean safe rate reasonable breakfast included

Reviews.Title: “AN EXCELLENT WEEKEND BREAK”
Reviews.Author: David H
Reviews.Content: returned weekend break amsterdam decided stay hotel based previous trip advisor recommendations hotel close centraal station 5 minute walk easy walking distance amsterdams downtown attractions perfectly adequate werent anyway bed exceptionally comfortable quiet able sleep window hear breakfast excellent wide choice buffet style meant start day floor stairs steep narrow meant squeeze past bed wardrobe limited mobility wish ground floor left luggage day catching train home charge definitely stay hotel visit

Reviews.Title: “Good location”

Reviews.Content: stayed sep 2011 staff hotel polite friendly helpful little sightseeing trip irrelevant spent little time hotel located minutes central station meaning little distance carry bags amsterdam train obviously breakfast hotel pleasant bacon eggs host cold meats cheese plus toast bread rolls cereals etc set day negative rates little pricey reasonable hotel

Reviews.Content: front central train station amsterdam clean 3 stars expectations hotel match exactly requirements category located close supermarket buy store food fridge breakfast decent quality served food improve 10 euro required wifi expensive

Reviews.Content: nice clean safe hotel 5 minutes walk centraal station ten mins walk red light etc nice brekafast nice staff happy days woould definitely stay stayed various budget hotels dam soem damrak stay

Reviews.Content: hotel clean beautiful receptionists friendly helpful comes finding tourist attractions definetly stay hotels location perfect tourist attractions anne frank house sex museum red light district shops corner

Reviews.Title: “Great Location to explore the city!”

Reviews.Content: arrived hotel check 10am monday morning staff allowed leave bags secure locker safekeeping explore city location couldnt batter 1st visit amsterdam concerned getting lost coming straight centraal station saved lot stress handy reference wander followed signs station hotel reception clean tidy lift welcome sight deciding stairs bit exercise clean despite window looking onto building didnt matter anyway bed clean comfortable plenty storage space short stay bathroom clean plenty fresh towells provided daily breakfast fine friendly staff plenty cereal juice bread value money base excellent location beautiful amsterdam
